question:
In context of the recent progress in the establishment of Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund, consider the following statements about FIDF:
  1. It will provide loans to cooperatives and entrepreneurs.
  2. NABARD will be contributing to the fund.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The FIDF was approved by the cabinet in 2018. It is to provide loans for fisheries and aquaculture sector at subsidised interest rates. Fishermen, cooperatives in the sector and also aquaculture entrepreneurs will be able to avail loans from this fund. Recently, an MoU was signed by the Tamil Nadu government, NABARD and central fisheries department. Â Statement 2 is correct: The FIDF is to receive funds from nodal loan entities, budgetary support and also from the beneficiaries. NABARD or National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development is to raise some of the funds. Other nodal loan entities like National Cooperatives Development Cooperation (NCDC) will also be adding to the fund.
